title: KEEPFLY Kids Baby Toddler Cable Knit tie dye Children’s Pom Winter Hat Beanie
features: GREAT QUALITY: This durable tye dye cuff hat is incredibly soft, warm, and comfortable. Beautifully crafted from 50% viscose, 30% polyester, and 20% nylon. Hand wash cold. Lay out or hang to dry.

GREAT FIT: One size. The fit ranges from babies to small kids. Measures 7.5" x 10" x 1". Children's Hat size 20’ to 22’, ideal for many kids age 4-12 years. The beanie has plenty of stretch for growing into and getting multiple years use.

GREAT COLOR: A modern take on the throwback hippie look of the 1960s, this tie dye beanie gives off a fashionable, sporty, skater vibe. Comes in multiple different colors. Add a pop of color to your fall and winter look.

GREAT LOOK: Just when you think your child can’t get any cuter, here comes these adorable pom beanies. This thick, ribbed knit pom hat will keep your kid so warm and cuddly, you will want to see your cutie-pie in each color! Beautifully designed, this beanie cap will look fabulous on your little angel and is perfect when the weather turns from warm to snuggly. Great to throw on with everyday outfits and can add pop of style and fun with some cute boots or a winter coat.

WHEN TO WEAR: Throw this soft hat on your youngster for any chilly outdoor activity. Perfect for a cool, breezy day as well as in the freezing cold winter. Great for the playground, at a pumpkin patch, during Christmas season, in a stroller, at a parade, on a play date, at school or in the best spot…cuddled in your arms. Also makes a great birthday present or stocking stuffer!
description: Kids Baby Toddler Cable Knit tie dye Children’s Pom Winter Hat Beanie
